definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: Ez Eze 24:5) choicest, best, cstr. [[מִבְחַר]] De 12:11 + 10 t.; sf. [[מִבְחָרָיו]] Da 11:15; vows De 12:11; valleys Is 22:7; fir trees Is 37:24; cedars Je 22:7; bones Ez Eze 24:4; sepulchres Ge 23:6 (P); of the flock Ez Eze 24:5; of the Assyrians Ez Eze 23:7; captains Ex 15:4 (E poet.); young men Je 48:15; [[מבחר וטוב לבנון]] Ez Eze 31:16 (del. [[וטוב]] LXX Co); [[עַם]] [[מִבְחָרָיו]] Da 11:15 = his choice troops.
